text: Marie Lovise Widnes (1 November 1930 – 19 November 2021) was a Norwegian poet, author, singer, composer, and politician. She was born in Vanylven, Norway. She was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Møre og Romsdal in 1989, but was not re-elected in 1993. She was a member of the Labour Party. Widnes died on 19 November 2021, aged 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian singers Category:Norwegian composers Category:Norwegian writers Category:Norwegian poets Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Marie Lovise Widnes
